solution_line_template: She also spends {mortgage_multiplier}*${food_cost} = $<<{mortgage_multiplier}*{food_cost}={mortgage_cost}>>{mortgage_cost} on mortgage bills.
Her expenses in taxes amount to {tax_fraction}*${savings} = $<<{tax_fraction}*{savings}={tax_cost}>>{tax_cost}

Esperanza's total monthly expenses are ${tax_cost} on taxes + ${mortgage_cost} on mortgage bills + ${food_cost} on food + ${rent_cost} on rent = $<<{tax_cost}+{mortgage_cost}+{food_cost}+{rent_cost}={total_expenses}>>{total_expenses}
Her gross salary is ${total_expenses} for expenses + ${savings} on savings = $<<{total_expenses}+{savings}={gross_salary}>>{gross_salary}
